= !AvailableDataSize method =

*Project:* [ConsoleAppClasses  Console Application Runner Classes].

*Unit:* _PJPipe_.

*Class:* _[TPJPipe TPJPipe]_.

*Introduced:* v1.0

{{{
function AvailableDataSize: LongWord;
}}}

== Description ==

This method peeks the pipe to get the size of data available for reading from it.

The number of bytes of available data is returned by the method.

_EInOutError_ is raised if there is an error peeking the pipe.
